text: Ia mangɨ gumazamizibar arɨmariaba agɨva; egh gumazir aremeziba me damutɨ me ua dɨkav, egh lepa itir gumazibar amutɨ me ua zuegh, egh duar kurar gumazamizibagh apazaziba da batogh. Bizir ia inizim ia purama a ini, ia a gɨvezezir puvatɨ. Kamaghɨra ia pura a isɨ gumazamizibar anɨng. Ia a bagh ivezitam inian kogham.
